TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed AudioChannel extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Enumerates values that indicate the number of channels in the audio format.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.Speech.AudioFormat.SpeechAudioFormatInfo.ChannelCount%2A> property gets a member of <xref:System.Speech.AudioFormat.AudioChannel> that indicates the number of channels for the audio format.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Speech.AudioFormat.AudioChannel Mono = int32(1)

Docs.summary: The audio format has one channel.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Speech.AudioFormat.AudioChannel Stereo = int32(2)

Docs.summary: The audio format has two channels.
